author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Macy’s, Nordstrom, Disney, Amazon, Tesla, Fox, Oracle, AMD, Micron, Monsanto, Helios - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text:
Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Wednesday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 6.9%: The department store chain topped same-store sales expectations in the most recent quarter and boosted its profit and revenue projections for the 2018 fiscal year. —Up 2.3%: The strong results from Macy’s lifted other […]
